ygData.subject: Digest Number 132, message: 14
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahoy I dont know why you have reason to believe anything at all, but I would think that maybe the silk lined steel cap you can buy from dear old Bom Knotwood
ygData.messageBody:
Ahoy
I dont know why you have reason to believe anything at
all, but I would think that maybe the silk lined steel
cap you can buy from dear old Bom Knotwood could be
used. It makes sense, as a breathing apparatus
probably should be connected to the head, and the
mouth.
I am not even close to having the money to experiment
on my own, but as you see I am willing to give
suggestions :)

Captain Piip Ignatz
Pirates of Dark Tide
Innoruuk

> The series here is a combo of 5 with a fish scale,a

> Help me finish this series out by trying some of the
> other components at the mills and letting folks here
> know
> what you have failed on. I have reason to believe
> this is close to the 'scuba gear' recipe
>
> Cheers,
>
> "FizzWizz" of tunare
